amendment.description: To provide for an extension of the Draft Proposed Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Program 2010-2015.

action.text: Amendment SA 1535 proposed by Senator Vitter.
Amendment SA 1535 under the order of 3/7/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 28.
